name: Ikibago
synopsis: Play the role of a pirate and set out to discover the lost treasure of Ikibago in this fascinating puzzle and action game! Barrels of different colours move from left to right. Your objective is to align at least 3 barrels of the same colour in the same column before it disappears from the screen. Use the stylus to switch the barrels while avoiding different traps! Bonuses are available - make sure to use them carefully to complete the 121 missions of this game!
